Posted By: Magyrato (7/8/2010 2:03:30 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I think the lack of flavor text makes it just that much more cl\*\*\*ic. The point of the m10 text was to kinda say "Hey look, we're bringing back that card from your youth!" which is not really necessary this time around since the card hasn't gone anywhere since its last printing. While I liked the text then, I would have raised an eyebrow if it made it to the M11 printing. And there's no denying that the lack of flavor text gives it that iconic feel.

Posted By: Yozuk (8/8/2010 9:07:45 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Giving this card only four stars because it lacks a certain flavor text is like giving Black Lotus only four stars because you don't like flowers. Cards should be rated based on playability, and this is top-notch. That being said, once the powercreep extends to the point where it is doubtful that lightning bolt is the strongest burn ever printed, I'll probably quit Magic. Cards don't need to get more powerful than this without being restricted.
